citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on18-Feb-20 at 11:00 AM.
Upon arrival, the lab coordinator was not available for inspection. The lab coordinator contacted the inspector via
email and discussed future hours of availability.

narrative:
2.38(b)
MISCELLANEOUS.
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on18-Feb-20 at 11:00 AM.
Upon arrival, the lab coordinator was not available for inspection. The lab coordinator contacted the inspector via
email and discussed future hours of availability.
